attributes.action: Parliament to set aside the referendum held on 23rd June 2016
attributes.additional_details: There have been racial attacks attributed to the result. There are many more reasons to consider and we call upon Parliament to study all of these and not put the future of GB and our children at risk
attributes.background: The people were misinformed on many issues, there has been a detrimental affect on the economy. Research collaboration with the EU is already under threat. Scotland could leave the UK. The Good Friday agreement could be jeopardised
